description: Try our easy to follow Spaghetti with Meatballs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta with meatballs,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,High protein,Low salt,Tree nut free,Mince,Low sugar,Beef,Peanut free
name: Spaghetti with Meatballs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs olive oil (save 1 tbs olice oil for sauce)

recipeInstructions.text: Meatballs: Combine all ingredients, except oil, in a bowl and season well with salt and pepper. Mix together well using clean hands and roll into walnut-sized balls. Heat oil in a frying pan and cook meatballs over a medium-high heat, turning often until golden brown. Remove from pan and drain on paper towel. Wipe out pan with paper towel and return to heat.

Sauce: Add extra oil to pan and fry onion and garlic over medium heat until soft. Add canned tomatoes, sugar and basil, and cook for 5 minutes. Return meatballs to sauce and simmer for 10 minutes while pasta is cooking.
Pasta: Cook spaghetti in plenty of boiling, salted water until tender. Drain and divide between serving plates. Spoon meatballs and sauce over spaghetti and top with Parmesan, if desired.
